mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_no, c.task_no, c.member_no, c.comment_content, c.comment_register_date, m.name, m.profile_path FROM comment c INNER JOIN member m ON c.member_no = m.member_no WHERE task_no = #{task_no} ORDER BY c.comment_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (task_no, member_no, comment_content, comment_register_date) VALUES (#{task_no}, #{member_no}, #{comment_content}, NOW())
